Title: ... and the Pot, Too!
Description:
Sure, I'm willing to help you guys out. But we need to eat, too! I don't even have a pot to cook in! Let alone ingredients to put in it!

Here's a list of the things that I need. Now get!
ObjectivesText: Collect 12 Root Vegetables and 1 Cast Iron Pot.
CompletionText: Do you have everything from the list?!
RewardText: Well there you go. We should be plenty good, now.
